message: Let's split 60/40. I think this is a fair deal considering the inflation.
I think 55/45 is a fairer split, considering the inflation will affect my share in the next round.

Bob, my offer from Round 1 is still the best option for you. If you reject this, I will keep lowering my offer in the next rounds. It's better to take a decent deal now than risk losing more with each passing round.
